verses.roman:
havirdhānād dhavirdhānī
vidurāsūta ṣaṭ sutān
barhiṣadaṁ gayaṁ śuklaṁ
kṛṣṇaṁ satyaṁ jitavratam

synonyms: havirdhānāt—from Havirdhāna; havirdhānī—the name of the wife of Havirdhāna; vidura—O Vidura; asūta—gave birth; ṣaṭ—six; sutān—sons; barhiṣadam—of the name Barhiṣat; gayam—of the name Gaya; śuklam—of the name Śukla; kṛṣṇam—of the name Kṛṣṇa; satyam—of the name Satya; jitavratam—of the name Jitavrata.
translation: Havirdhāna, the son of Mahārāja Antardhāna, had a wife named Havirdhānī, who gave birth to six sons, named Barhiṣat, Gaya, Śukla, Kṛṣṇa, Satya and Jitavrata.
